definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: Therefore, the laser allows a reduction in the number of lasers in a spectroscopic analysis system.
sentences.chinese: 由此，光谱分析系统中的激光器数量将得以减少。

sentences.english: Principles and applications of modern near infrared spectroscopic techniques.
sentences.chinese: 现代近红外光谱分析技术的原理及应用。

sentences.english: Meanwhile , it has been analyzed by IR and physical-chemical properities of lysolecithin .
sentences.chinese: 同时，研究了溶血磷脂基本理化指标和红外光谱分析。

sentences.english: Fourier transform infrared spectra demonstrated that the aggregate substance on aluminum foils was aluminum myristate.
sentences.chinese: 经红外光谱分析可知，铝表面形成了疏水性十四酸铝。

sentences.english: There are many methods in its quantitative spectral analyses.
sentences.chinese: 光谱分析仪的定量分析有许多种方法。

sentences.english: The product was characterized by melt point and IR spectra analysis.
sentences.chinese: 经熔点测定和红外光谱分析，确证产品是苯酚。

sentences.english: The product was identi-fied by elemental and spectral analyses.
sentences.chinese: 对合成的配合物进行了元素及光谱分析。

sentences.english: The biological activity of the expressed VHb was demonstrated by CO difference spectrum analysis.
sentences.chinese: 经CO差示光谱分析测定，该蛋白具有生物活性。

sentences.english: A method for the spectra analysis of light-conversion farm film(LCFF) has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了转光农膜的荧光光谱分析方法。
